storage.title: My first Dapp
storage.intro: A shared data storage space on the blockchain. Anyone can make changes by paying a gas fee.

tweet.title: OasisTweet
tweet.intro: Publish your thoughts. Censorship resistant and no spam! People must pay YOU to leave comments on your post.

erc20.title: ERC-20 tokens
erc20.intro: Publish ERC-20 tokens and trade them on the on-chain Uniswap exchange!

tweet-0.5.title: OasisTweet for Solidity 0.5+
tweet-0.5.intro: The same as the OasisTweet above but for Solidity 0.5.0+ compilers
